mapper.select: SELECT u.username, u.`password`, a.authority, a.url FROM `user` u INNER JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN role_auth ra ON r.id = ra.role_id INNER JOIN auth a ON ra.auth_id = a.id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.enabled = 1 AND r.enabled = 1 AND a.enabled = 1
